deploymentConfig.description: Represents deployment configuration information for a service deployed on Azure Container Instances.

cpu_cores.description: The number of CPU cores to allocate for this web service. Can be a decimal. Defaults to 0.1

memory_gb.description: The amount of memory (in GB) to allocate for this web service. Can be a decimal. Defaults to 0.5

tags.description: A dictionary of key value tags to give this web service.

properties.description: A dictionary of key value properties to give this web service. These properties cannot be changed after deployment, however new key value pairs can be added.

description.description: A description to give this web service.

auth_enbaled.description: Whether or not to enable auth for this web service. Defaults to False.

enable_app_insights.description: Enable Application Insights diagnostics and data collection. Defaults to False.

collect_model_data.description: Whether or not to enable model data collection for this web service. Defaults to False.

primary_key.description: A primary auth key to use for this web service.

secondary_key.description: A secondary auth key to use for this web service.

location.description: The Azure region to deploy this web service to. If not specified, the Workspace location will be used. For more details on available regions, see Products by region <https://azure.microsoft.com/global-infrastructure/services/?products=container-instances>.

ssl_enabled.description: Whether or not to enable SSL for this web service. Defaults to False.

ssl_cert_pem_file.description: The cert file needed if SSL is enabled.

ssl_key_pem_file.description: The key file needed if SSL is enabled.

ssl_cname.description: The cname for if SSL is enabled.

dns_name_label.description: The DNS name label for the scoring endpoint. If not specified a unique DNS name label will be generated for the scoring endpoint.

cmk_vault_base_url.description: customer managed key vault base url
